about_the_game:
In the neon-lit dystopia of our future, you're a bounty hunter tasked with dismantling The Abyss, a corporate behemoth wreaking havoc on the fragile balance of power.

Our story will feature a variety of unique and detailed campaigns that will transport the player to a new district of Nova Haven to hunt down a member of The Abyss - from the heights of Uptown to the grimy underbelly of the Sewers.

With each campaign, you'll encounter fresh dangers, face off against new adversaries, and confront unique mini-bosses with their own abilities and tactics.

Will you emerge victorious, or will the city succumb to the darkness?
The answer lies in the barrel of your gun.
